body_html: ff5fa11 was awful (I made a disclaimer that I don't know nearly enough about compiler/linker/threading library interactions) but it came about because conda mkl package that is used in pytorch conda packages and in many source installs does not come with libmkl_gnu_thread. Rather than switching to clang may be it is better to use mkl distribunions that come with libmkl_gnu_thread and revert ff5fa11.
